question:
You and some friends ate a meal at a restaurant to celebrate a special occasions, and you were very pleased with the food and service.
Write a letter to the restaurant manager. In your letter
-give details of your visit to the restaurant
-explain the reason for the celebration
-say what was good about the food and the service
text: Hope this letter finds you in sound health and high spirits. To begin with, we have booked a lunch meal at your restaurant supreme dishes located on Adams street.
It was the occasion of my promotion in our sales department to managerial level, that we all decided to celebrate in a grand way. Therefore, we approached you to register for the said services.

So, after  ,lunch my colleagues started praising the food and services offered at your restaurant.                        Moreover, it was an amazing experience with the orchestra staff, as they play any songs recommended by us and are thoroughly professional with friendly behaviour. The whole ambience was altogether awesome and caring . There was no service, which is to be complained, especially the quality of cuisine ingredients looks so fresh with fabulous taste obtained by different spices and flavours.
Furthermore, the hospitality of your staff is the best in town and I will organize all future events in your restaurants and also provide testimonials to others regarding your best services.
Looking forward to your response and comment.
